posts.post_content:
Hello, 

I am looking to sell my 1888 Glass Plate Negative by Goodwin & Co. of John Harkins wearing the Baltimore Orioles uniform. The plate measures 8” x 5” and is in excellent condition. I would like to get $2500 for this item, but I am also open to best offers.

If you are interested please message me with any questions.
Hubert

Hi Hubert,

I've been thinking about that Harkins negative you posted back in May and can't stop thinking about it.

Email sent regarding the item.

Take care,
Ray Novak
I believe it's in Legendary's auction right now
that is correct. The negative will be sold at Legendary Auctions. If you're interested in owning the negative the lot # is 774 and the bidding starts on August 25th.
